headline: 3 Reasons to Sell RVTY and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Revvity’s shares (currently trading at $111) have posted a disappointing 8.5% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 5.1% gain. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
